content.en: Root analysis revolution: Scientists are using algorithms to accurately measure root length and process images of rice roots. They are also using algorithms to analyze the complexity and angle of maize roots, as well as to extract root system phenotypes from images. Additionally, algorithms are being used for automated image analysis of plant roots, characterization of root cells and tissues, and phenotyping root traits of various crops. These algorithm-based methods are helping researchers accelerate the analysis and measurement of plant root systems.
content.da: Rodanalyse-revolution: Forskere bruger algoritmer til præcist at måle rodlængde og behandle billeder af rødder fra ris. De bruger også algoritmer til at analysere kompleksiteten og vinklen af majsrødder samt til at udtrække rodsytemets fænotyper fra billeder. Derudover anvendes algoritmer til automatiseret billedanalyse af planterødder, karakterisering af rodceller og væv samt fænotypning af rodsystemets træk i forskellige afgrøder. Disse algoritmebaserede metoder hjælper forskere med at accelerere analysen og målingen af planters rodsystemer.
